menu_structure.description: Quick access to essential settings (borrowed from Sony's cinema line)

settings.name: Image Quality/Rec
settings.description: Access to image quality and recording settings

settings.name: JPEG/HEIF Switch
settings.description: Selects JPEG or HEIF as the file format when not shooting RAW

settings.name: Image Quality Settings
settings.description: Access to quality settings for JPEG/HEIF images

settings.name: Aspect Ratio
settings.description: Sets the aspect ratio of still images

settings.name: File Format
settings.description: Sets the file format for still images

settings.name: Movie Settings
settings.description: Access to settings for movie recording

settings.name: APS-C S35 Shooting
settings.description: Determines whether to shoot with an APS-C equivalent field of view

settings.name: Long Exposure NR
settings.description: Sets noise reduction processing for shots with a 1-second or longer exposure

settings.name: Zoom
settings.description: Access to zoom settings

settings.name: Shooting Display
settings.description: Access to display settings during shooting

settings.name: Drive Mode
settings.description: Sets the drive mode such as continuous shooting or self-timer

settings.name: Bracket Settings
settings.description: Sets self-timer shooting in bracket mode, shooting order for exposure bracketing

settings.name: Interval Shoot Func.
settings.description: Configures interval shooting

settings.name: Pixel Shift Multi Shoot
settings.description: Creates images with higher resolution than normal shooting by combining multiple images

settings.name: Silent Mode Settings
settings.description: Sets whether to shoot without shutter sounds

settings.name: Shutter Type
settings.description: Sets whether to use a mechanical or electronic shutter

settings.name: Release w/o Lens
settings.description: Sets whether to release the shutter when no lens is attached

settings.name: Release w/o Card
settings.description: Sets whether to release the shutter when no memory card is inserted

settings.name: Anti-flicker Set.
settings.description: Reduces impact of flickering from artificial light sources

settings.name: Zoom Range
settings.description: Sets the zoom range for functions other than optical zoom

settings.name: Zoom Speed
settings.description: Sets the zoom speed when using custom key for zoom operation

settings.name: Zoom Speed (Remote)
settings.description: Sets zoom speed when using remote commander

settings.name: Live View Display
settings.description: Sets whether to show images with effects like exposure compensation on screen

settings.name: Emph disp dur shoot
settings.description: Whether to display a frame around the edge of the screen during shooting

settings.name: Shot. Result Preview
settings.description: Automatically shows captured image after shooting

settings.name: Aperture Preview
settings.description: Shows preview of aperture depth of field when button is pressed

settings.name: Shooting Info. Display
settings.description: Sets whether the shooting information display automatically follows orientation changes

settings.name: TC/UB Disp. Setting
settings.description: Sets the display for the time counter and user bits

settings.name: Flash Mode
settings.description: Sets the flash mode

settings.name: Flash Comp.
settings.description: Adjusts the flash output

settings.name: Exp.comp.set
settings.description: Sets whether exposure compensation value applies to both flash and ambient light or only ambient

settings.name: Wireless Flash
settings.description: Sets whether to use wireless flash

settings.name: Red Eye Reduction
settings.description: Reduces red-eye phenomenon with flash

settings.name: ISO
settings.description: Sets ISO sensitivity

settings.name: ISO AUTO Min. SS
settings.description: Sets the shutter speed at which ISO sensitivity starts changing in ISO AUTO mode

settings.name: Auto/Manual Swt. Set.
settings.description: Sets whether to switch exposure modes automatically or manually

settings.name: Exposure comp.
settings.description: Compensates for the entire image brightness

settings.name: Reset EV Comp.
settings.description: Sets whether to maintain the exposure value when turning off the power

settings.name: Exposure step
settings.description: Sets the increment step for shutter speed, aperture, and exposure

settings.name: Metering Mode
settings.description: Selects the method for measuring brightness

settings.name: Face Priority in Multi
settings.description: Sets whether the camera measures brightness based on detected faces in Multi metering mode

settings.name: Spot Metering Point
settings.description: Sets whether to coordinate the spot metering position with the focus area

settings.name: AEL w/ shutter
settings.description: Sets whether to perform AE lock when pressing the shutter button halfway

settings.name: Exposure Std. Adjust
settings.description: Adjusts the camera's standard for correct exposure value

settings.name: White Balance
settings.description: Adjusts the color tones according to the light source

settings.name: Priority Set in AWB
settings.description: Sets which tone to prioritize in auto white balance under light sources like incandescent light

settings.name: Shutter AWB Lock
settings.description: Sets whether to lock white balance during shutter press in auto white balance mode

settings.name: Shockless WB
settings.description: Sets the transition speed when the white balance setting is changed

settings.name: Creative Look
settings.description: Selects the desired image processing with rich gradation and colors

settings.name: Picture Profile
settings.description: Changes settings such as color and gradation for movie recording

settings.name: Soft Skin Effect
settings.description: Sets the Soft Skin Effect and the effect level

settings.name: Zebra Display
settings.description: Sets zebra pattern to guide exposure

settings.name: Focus Mode
settings.description: Selects the focus method to suit the movement of the subject

settings.name: Priority Set in AF-S
settings.description: Sets whether to release the shutter even if the subject is not in focus in Single-shot AF mode

settings.name: Priority Set in AF-C
settings.description: Sets whether to release the shutter even if the subject is not in focus in Continuous AF mode

settings.name: AF Tracking Sensitivity
settings.description: Sets the AF tracking sensitivity for still image mode

settings.name: AF Illuminator
settings.description: Sets whether to use the AF illuminator in dark scenes to aid focusing

settings.name: Aperture Drive in AF
settings.description: Sets whether to prioritize focus or shutter release in AF mode with certain lenses

settings.name: AF w/ shutter
settings.description: Sets whether to perform autofocus when the shutter button is pressed halfway

settings.name: Pre-AF
settings.description: Sets whether to perform auto focusing before the shutter button is half pressed

settings.name: AF Transition Speed
settings.description: Sets the focusing speed when the focus target changes during movie recording

settings.name: AF Subj. Shift Sensitivity
settings.description: Sets the sensitivity for switching focus to another subject when the original subject moves out of focus area

settings.name: Focus Area Limit
settings.description: Limits the types of focus area settings available for selection

settings.name: Switch V/H AF Area
settings.description: Sets whether to adjust focus area position based on camera orientation (horizontal/vertical)

settings.name: Focus Area
settings.description: Selects the area of focus

settings.name: Focus Area Color
settings.description: Sets the color of the frame indicating the focusing area

settings.name: AF Area Registration
settings.description: Sets whether to register the focus area to a custom button for quick recall

settings.name: Del. Regist. AF Area
settings.description: Deletes the registered focus area position

settings.name: AF Area Auto Clear
settings.description: Sets whether the focus area is displayed all the time or disappears after focus is achieved

settings.name: Disp. AF Area during Trck
settings.description: Sets whether to display the focusing area in tracking mode

settings.name: AF-C Area Display
settings.description: Sets whether to display the focus area in continuous AF mode

settings.name: Phase Detect. Area
settings.description: Sets whether to display phase detection AF area

settings.name: Circ. of Focus Point
settings.description: Sets whether to allow the focus point to move from one end to the other when moving the focus area

settings.name: AF Frame Move Amt
settings.description: Sets the distance to move the focus area frame

settings.name: Face/Eye Prior. in AF
settings.description: Sets whether to detect faces or eyes inside the focus area and focus on them

settings.name: Face/Eye Subject
settings.description: Selects the type of subject to detect for face/eye priority

settings.name: Subj. Recog in AF
settings.description: Sets whether to detect the specified subject type inside the focus area

settings.name: Right/Left Eye Select
settings.description: Sets whether to focus on the right or left eye when face/eye priority is active

settings.name: Face/Eye Frame Disp.
settings.description: Sets whether to display the face/eye detection frame

settings.name: Subject Recognition
settings.description: Sets the subjects to be detected

settings.name: Recognition Target
settings.description: Sets the target for recognition by the camera's AI system

settings.name: Focus Map
settings.description: Provides a visual indicator of depth that highlights in-focus areas for precise focus

settings.name: Focus Magnifier
settings.description: Enlarges the image to check focus

settings.name: Focus Magnif. Time
settings.description: Sets the length of time the image will be shown magnified

settings.name: Initial Focus Mag.
settings.description: Sets the initial magnification scale when using the focus magnifier

settings.name: AF in Focus Mag.
settings.description: Sets whether to use autofocus when showing magnified view

settings.name: Initial Focus Mag.
settings.description: Sets the initial magnification when magnifying the display

settings.name: Peaking Display
settings.description: Sets the peaking function which enhances the outline of in-focus areas during manual focus

settings.name: Peaking Level
settings.description: Sets the level of peaking enhancement

settings.name: Peaking Color
settings.description: Sets the color used for the peaking enhancement

settings.name: Focus Bracket
settings.description: Takes multiple images with different focus positions, useful for focus stacking

settings.name: Focus Bracket. settings
settings.description: Configures focus bracketing settings

settings.name: Playback Target Select
settings.description: Sets which card slot to use for playing back images

settings.name: View Mode
settings.description: Sets how images are grouped for playback

settings.name: Enlarge Image
settings.description: Enlarges the image being played back

settings.name: Enlarge Initial Mag.
settings.description: Sets the initial magnification scale when playing back enlarged images

settings.name: Enlarge Initial Pos.
settings.description: Sets the initial position when enlarging an image during playback

settings.name: Protect
settings.description: Protects images against accidental erasure

settings.name: Rating
settings.description: Assigns ratings to recorded images on a scale from 1-5 stars

settings.name: Rating Set (Custom Key)
settings.description: Sets the rating value available when rating images with the key assigned using Custom Key Setting

settings.name: Delete
settings.description: Deletes selected images

settings.name: Delete confirm.
settings.description: Sets whether 'Delete' or 'Cancel' is selected by default on the delete confirmation screen

settings.name: Rotate
settings.description: Rotates the image

settings.name: Copy
settings.description: Copies images from one memory card to another

settings.name: Photo Capture
settings.description: Captures a still image from a movie

settings.name: JPEG/HEIF Switch
settings.description: Switches the file format between JPEG and HEIF for images displayed during playback

settings.name: Continuous Play for Interval
settings.description: Continuously plays back images shot using interval shooting

settings.name: Play Speed for Interval
settings.description: Sets the playback speed when playing back images with Continuous Play for Interval

settings.name: Slide Show
settings.description: Plays a slideshow of stored images

settings.name: Image Index
settings.description: Sets the number of images displayed on the index screen

settings.name: Display as Group
settings.description: Sets whether to display images shot in burst mode as a group

settings.name: Display Rotation
settings.description: Sets whether to rotate vertically oriented images during playback

settings.name: Focus Frame Display
settings.description: Sets whether to display the focus frame when reviewing images

settings.name: Image Jump Setting
settings.description: Sets the method for jumping between images during playback

settings.name: Smartphone Connection
settings.description: Sets whether to connect the camera to a smartphone

settings.name: Connection
settings.description: Displays information for connecting the camera to a smartphone

settings.name: Always Connected
settings.description: Sets whether to always connect the camera and a smartphone that have been connected before

settings.name: Bluetooth Function
settings.description: Sets whether to activate the Bluetooth function

settings.name: WPS Push
settings.description: Lets you register an access point easily by pushing the WPS button

settings.name: Access Point Set.
settings.description: Lets you register your access point manually

settings.name: Bluetooth Rmt Ctrl
settings.description: Sets whether to use a Bluetooth remote commander

settings.name: Device Name Edit
settings.description: Allows you to change the device name under Wi-Fi Direct

settings.name: Import Root Certificate
settings.description: Imports a root certificate to authenticate external services

settings.name: Security (IPsec)
settings.description: Configures security settings for IPsec connections

settings.name: Reset Network Set.
settings.description: Resets all network settings to default values

settings.name: FTP Transfer Func.
settings.description: Settings for FTP image transfer

settings.name: PC Remote Function
settings.description: Controls the camera remotely from a computer

settings.name: Airplane Mode
settings.description: Disables all wireless communications from the device

settings.name: Edit Device Name
settings.description: Changes the device name for network connections

settings.name: Monitor Brightness
settings.description: Adjusts the screen brightness

settings.name: Viewfinder Bright.
settings.description: When using the electronic viewfinder, sets the brightness of the viewfinder

settings.name: Finder Color Temp.
settings.description: Adjusts the color temperature of the viewfinder

settings.name: Display Quality
settings.description: Sets the display quality

settings.name: Finder Frame Rate
settings.description: Sets the frame rate for the viewfinder during still image shooting

settings.name: TC/UB Disp. Setting
settings.description: Sets the display for the time counter, user bits, and recording format

settings.name: Gamma Display Assist
settings.description: Enables the Gamma Display Assist function, which shows a normal-contrast preview when using S-Log gamma

settings.name: Gamma Disp. Assist Typ.
settings.description: Sets the conversion type for the Gamma Display Assist

settings.name: Display Media Info.
settings.description: Displays recording time available for movies and number of recordable still images on the memory card

settings.name: Auto Review
settings.description: Sets automatic review to display the captured image after shooting

settings.name: Power Save Start Time
settings.description: Sets the time before the camera automatically powers off

settings.name: DISP (Screen Disp) Set
settings.description: Sets the screen information to be displayed when DISP (Display Setting) button is pressed

settings.name: REC w/ Shutter
settings.description: Sets whether to record movies using the shutter button

settings.name: Zoom Ring Rotate
settings.description: Assigns zoom in/out functions to the zoom ring rotation direction

settings.name: Custom Key Setting
settings.description: Assigns functions to the custom buttons for shooting or playback

settings.name: Custom Key/Dial Set.
settings.description: Assigns desired functions to the desired keys and dials

settings.name: My Dial Settings
settings.description: Registers functions to the custom dials and recall them when shooting

settings.name: Dial Setup
settings.description: Sets the functions of the front/rear dials in manual exposure mode

settings.name: Av/Tv Rotate
settings.description: Sets the direction of rotation for front/rear dials to adjust aperture and shutter speed

settings.name: Function Ring(Lens)
settings.description: Assigns a function to the function ring on the lens

settings.name: Func. of Touch Operation
settings.description: Sets which operation is activated by touch operation on the monitor

settings.name: Dial/Wheel Lock
settings.description: Sets whether to lock the dials and wheel by pressing and holding the Fn button

settings.name: Touch Operation
settings.description: Sets whether to activate touch panel operations

settings.name: Touch Sensitivity
settings.description: Sets the touch panel sensitivity

settings.name: Touch Panel/Pad
settings.description: Sets whether to activate touch panel operations when shooting with the monitor, or touch pad operations when shooting with the viewfinder

settings.name: Touch Pad Settings
settings.description: Adjusts settings for touch pad operations when shooting with the viewfinder

settings.name: Fn Menu Settings
settings.description: Customizes the functions displayed when the Fn (Function) button is pressed

settings.name: Different Set for Still/Mv
settings.description: Sets whether to apply different settings in photo and movie modes

settings.name: MOVIE/S&Q Settings
settings.description: Customizes settings for movie and slow & quick motion recording

settings.name: Format
settings.description: Formats the memory card

settings.name: Rec. Media Settings
settings.description: Sets how images are recorded to the two memory card slots

settings.name: Select Rec. Media
settings.description: Selects which memory card slot to use for recording

settings.name: File/Folder Settings
settings.description: Sets file names and folders for still images

settings.name: Movie File Settings
settings.description: Sets file numbering and names for movies

settings.name: Recover Media
settings.description: Attempts to recover the image database file and enable normal recording and playback

settings.name: Area/Date/Time Setting
settings.description: Sets the region, date, and time

settings.name: NTSC/PAL Selector
settings.description: Changes the TV format of the device

settings.name: Audio signals
settings.description: Sets whether to beep during focus or self-timer operations

settings.name: Anti-Dust Function
settings.description: Sets the anti-dust function to clean the image sensor

settings.name: Sensor Cleaning
settings.description: Vibrates the image sensor to remove dust

settings.name: Touch Operation
settings.description: Sets whether to activate touch operations

settings.name: Auto Power OFF Temp.
settings.description: Sets the temperature at which the camera turns off automatically during shooting

settings.name: IR Remote Ctrl
settings.description: Sets whether to use the infrared remote control

settings.name: HDMI Resolution
settings.description: Sets the resolution when connecting to HDMI TV

settings.name: HDMI Output Settings
settings.description: Sets the HDMI output settings

settings.name: USB Connection
settings.description: Sets the USB connection method

settings.name: USB LUN Setting
settings.description: Sets whether to limit USB connection functions

settings.name: USB Power Supply
settings.description: Sets whether to supply power via USB cable when connected to a computer or USB device

settings.name: HDMI Info. Display
settings.description: Sets whether to display shooting info on HDMI-connected TV

settings.name: Video Light Mode
settings.description: Sets the illumination setting for the HVL-LBPC LED light

settings.name: Delete Confirm.
settings.description: Sets whether Delete or Cancel is preselected in the delete confirmation screen

settings.name: Language
settings.description: Selects the language to be used in menu items and messages

settings.name: Save/Load Settings
settings.description: Saves camera settings to and loads them from a memory card

settings.name: Setting Reset
settings.description: Restores the product to default settings

settings.name: Display From My Menu
settings.description: Sets whether My Menu appears first when pressing MENU button

settings.name: Version
settings.description: Displays the camera software version

settings.name: Regulatory Information
settings.description: Displays the regulatory information

menu_structure.description: A customizable menu tab where users can add frequently accessed settings from other menus

settings.name: Add Item
settings.description: Adds a menu item to My Menu

settings.name: Sort Item
settings.description: Rearranges menu items added to My Menu

settings.name: Delete Item
settings.description: Deletes menu items added to My Menu

settings.name: Delete Page
settings.description: Deletes all the menu items on a page in My Menu

settings.name: Delete All
settings.description: Deletes all the menu items added to My Menu

settings.name: Display From My Menu
settings.description: Sets whether to display My Menu first when the MENU button is pressed
